scripts.all_tests: cucumber-js src/features/**/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/**/**/*.ts --require src/utils/cucumber-timeout.ts -f json:./reports/report.json --format html:./reports/report.html
scripts.contactus_tests: cucumber-js src/features/Contact_Us.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/**/**/*.ts --require src/**/**/**/**/utils/cucumber-timeout.ts -f json:./reports/report.json --format html:./reports/report.html
scripts.Login_tests: cucumber-js src/features/Login.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/**/**/*.ts --require src/**/**/**/**/utils/cucumber-timeout.ts --format progress --format json:reports/report.json --format html:./reports/report.html
scripts.real: cucumber-js src/features/**/Singuppage.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/**/**/*.ts --require src/utils/cucumber-timeout.ts -f json:./reports/report.json --format html:./reports/report.html
scripts.typesense: cucumber-js src/features/**/LoginCloud.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/**/**/*.ts --require src/utils/cucumber-timeout.ts -f json:./reports/report.json --format html:./reports/report.html
scripts.JHT_test: cucumber-js src/features/**/Tech.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/**/**/*.ts --require src/utils/cucumber-timeout.ts -f json:./reports/report.json --format html:./reports/report.html
